title: Review: Pivot Switchblade
subtitle: In a world obsessed with what discipline you ride, this bike doesn't have time for that.
author: cole
description: It's not enduro, it's not trail. Perhaps they should have called it the Swiss Army. No, that would never fly.
keywords: mountain, bike, pivot, carbon, pivot bikes, review, switchblade, 29, 27 plus, 29er, enduro, all mountain, trail
